doc.title: Misplaced
doc.plot: Something fundamental is missing from Jonathon's marriage and he has started to drift in his marriage to Shelly. What was once a romantic marriage between friends has collapsed. So much so that Jonathon has started to troll the internet for some action. He is at the point where his virtual relationships are becoming real and he is setting up meetings with his web lovers. One of Jonathon's main problems is that he doesn't know what he wants. Little does he suspect his wife Shelly is about to catch up to his double life and find out what Jonathon has really been up to and how misplaced he has become.
